Projects

Below are some projects which I have been working on.

IBM Machine Learning Projects

In this project, I am part of a team of 4–5 students, where we analyse datasets and solve real-world problems. Working closely with IBM, we utilised a suite of tools to deliver solutions. Through this project, I am gaining hands-on experience and developing skills in:

  • Data Processing: Using Python and Pandas for cleaning, transforming, and preparing data.
  • Predictive Modelling: Building and validating models; communicating results with visualisations.
  • Large Language Models (LLMs): Exploring applications of modern language models.
  • IBM Watsonx: Using IBM’s AI platform for analysis and deployment.
  • RAG Optimization: Implementing Retrieval-Augmented Generation techniques.
  • Enterprise Search: Developing search solutions for large-scale data.

This project provides the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and gain practical experience in ML and data science.

Open slideshow

Automated Geographic Data Extraction and Processing System

Developed an automated solution to extract, process, and analyse geospatial data from a RESTful API and export it into a structured CSV format. The system handles large volumes of data and complex geospatial attributes.

  • Key features: API integration (or scraping fallback), multi-format handling (JSON/XML/CSV/text), error handling (rate limits/CAPTCHAs/structure changes), automation & scheduling, and export-ready output.
  • Learnings & challenges: API limitations and fallbacks, handling unstructured data, improving scraping efficiency while staying compliant. Future: validation/quality checks, performance and recovery.

View the code on GitHub

Personal Fitness Dashboard Project

Built an interactive Power BI dashboard to track and analyse personal fitness data (steps, calories, distance) for actionable insights.

  • Designed a Power BI dashboard tracking steps, calories, distance, and active vs resting time.
  • Collected and cleaned health-app data to ensure data integrity for analysis.
  • Created interactive visuals (cards, pie charts, line graphs) showing monthly and yearly trends.
  • Optimised the data pipeline to improve clarity and usability of insights.
Download the Power BI file

My Resume Website

I created a personal resume website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This project involved:

  • Designing a clean UI to showcase skills, experiences, and projects.
  • Building a responsive layout using HTML and CSS.
  • Adding interactive elements and smooth navigation with JavaScript.

Visit the website

SQL & Python Pokemon Managing System

Built Python scripts like a personalised Pokédex to extract and display information from a Pokémon database.

  • Python scripts: Extract and display detailed Pokémon information.
  • SQL views & PLpgSQL: Functions to enhance retrieval and management.
  • Data manipulation: Tools to simplify complex data challenges.

View repo (if public)

Huffman Tree Encoder in C

Created a Huffman Tree Encoder using binary trees in C.

  • Binary Search Tree (BST): Efficient sorted data storage and retrieval.
  • Huffman Tree: Variable-length encoding based on character frequencies.

View repo
